question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. coffee cup
B. PANDEMIC book
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The PANDEMIC book is on the table in the foreground, directly in front of the camera's viewpoint, while the coffee cup is further back on the table, making the book clearly closer.
